name: IP filter

Get SSID
func:
var ssid = msg.payload.substring(msg.payload.indexOf("ESSID") + 6).split('\n')[0];
return {topic:msg.topic, payload:{topic:msg.topic ,payload:ssid, userID: msg.userID }};

name: html.reset
Init device name
Device Names
func:
msg.payload['deviceAName'] = flow.get('deviceAProps').name;
return msg;

name: Save device config in Memory
Readings Alarm Scan
Prepare MQTT topic
Init flow Variables
Filter MQTT
func: return {topic:msg.topic.split('/')[3], payload:msg.payload};

name: Make Pretty
Settings Alarm Scan
Filter Websocket
Shift Msg
func: return msg.payload;

name: clear camera reset
func:
flow.set('resettingCamera',false);
return msg;

name: Set 1
func: return {topic:'turnOn', payload:1};

name: Set 0
func: return {topic:'turnOn', payload:0};

name: hold capture
func:
flow.set('resettingCamera',true);
return msg;

name: resume capture
func:
flow.set('resettingCamera',false);
return msg;

name: set to 1
func:
msg.payload = 1;
return msg;

name: set to 0
func:
msg.payload = 0;
return msg;

name: Process Data
Get camera process
Check if Process hung
Check for camera reset
Try Manual Trigger Again
func:
if (flow.get('device').manualTrigger.value == 1) return {topic:'manualTrigger',payload:true}
return null;

name: Programmable interval
Reset Delay
func: return [{topic:"reset",reset:1},{topic:"setCameraAvailable",payload:1}];

name: Set Camera Available
func:
flow.set('cameraInUse',false);
return null;

name: Re Init system
Set 1
func: return {topic:'turnOn', payload:1};

name: Set 0
func: return {topic:'turnOn', payload:0};

name: Set manual trigger
func:
flow.get('device').triggerMode.value  = 0;
flow.get('device').manualTrigger.value  = 1;
